Summary: Spherical object with petal-like protuberances traveled across sky; eclipsed by commercial aircraft; flew close to second commercial aircraft
trends: There have been no other sightings in Mukwonago
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was in the hot tub and remained there throughout the sighting. i noticed the object in the north east sky. at first i thought it was a balloon, but a commercial aircraft from mitchel airport eclipsed the object and i relized that it was further and larger than i had originally thought. the object's path brought it closer (view direction now ene) and i could see it more clearly. it was a light\pastel yellowish circle with light brownish petals. it looked like a sort of sunflower. nothing on the object moved. it's path was gently irratic, like a baloon, but it was moving much too fast to be a baloon. the object moved at about the same altitude across to the ese where it seemed to line up closely to another low altitude commercial aircraft that was moving in a northerly direction. finally, the object (now se) made some final irratic, smooth motions and headed vertical until it disappeared from sight. the most curious thing about the sighting was that the appearance of the object never varied. i always had the same exat appearance. the petal-like protuberances remained in the same orientation throughout the sighting. it was like it was staring at me the whole time. i didn't notice any odd feelings or sensations during the sighting, but now i find myself continually watching the sky. it's a mystery that chews at me. note the attached drawing of the object was done in openoffice.
